welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Borna, Germany! This charming city is known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Borna has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Altenburg Nobitz Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Halle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wilmington Railway Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
